name: Manicure & Pedicure
description: Treat yourself to a luxurious manicure and pedicure session to rejuvenate your hands and feet.

name: Facial Massage
description: Indulge in a soothing facial massage to relax your facial muscles and rejuvenate your skin.

name: Hair Styling
description: Transform your look with our professional hair styling services, from cuts to styling and coloring.

name: Full Body Massage
description: Relax and unwind with a full body massage to release tension and promote overall well-being.

name: Waxing
description: Achieve smooth and silky skin with our waxing services, available for various body parts.

name: Makeup Application
description: Enhance your natural beauty or glam up for a special occasion with our professional makeup application.
